key_risks: High costs of OCS™ systems limiting adoption
Regulatory hurdles and dependence on approvals
Dependence on limited and unpredictable donor organ availability
Competition from traditional and emerging technologies
Ethical concerns related to organ allocation and access
controversies: Ethical considerations in organ allocation and donor consent
Stock volatility and lowered revenue guidance
social_issues: Equitable access to advanced organ transplant therapies
governance_issues: Operational uncertainties due to recent leadership changes
